# include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int n,o,x,i,count=0,d;
	
scanf("%d",&n);

	priority_queue <int, vector<int>, greater<int> > minq;
	priority_queue <int> maxq;

	while(n--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&o);
		if(o==1)
		{
			count++;
			scanf("%d",&x);
			if(count==1 || count==2) {
				maxq.push(x);
				continue;
			}

			if(count==3)
			{
				if(x>maxq.top()) minq.push(x);
				else 
				{
					d=maxq.top();
					maxq.pop();
					minq.push(d);
					maxq.push(x);
				}
				continue;
			}

			if(x>minq.top()) minq.push(x);

			else maxq.push(x);

			if(minq.size() > count/3)
			{
				maxq.push(minq.top());
				minq.pop();
			}

			else if(minq.size() < count/3)
			{
				minq.push(maxq.top());
				maxq.pop();
			}
		}

		if(o==2)
		{
			if(!minq.empty())
			{
				printf("%d\n",minq.top());
			}

			else printf("No reviews yet\n");
		}

	}

	return 0;
}
